name: Mass Transference
text: ACTION: move one of your structures to another eligible area that contains one or more of your units and place a command token from you reinforcements in that system. Then, return this card to the Admins player.

name: After Sight
text: When you declare a retreat: Choose one ship in the active system. That ship does not participate in the combat round and cannot be assigned hits. At the end of the combat round, return this card to the Qulane player.

name: Royal Coregency
text:
When you receive this card, you must place it face-up in your play area, you are now the "Viceroy". Take 1 relic from the Emperor's play area if available. Anytime you score a Public Objective, the Emperor also scores this objective. Both the Emperor and you are considered in control of Mecatol Rex while it is under either's control. Place the "Galactic Consulate" token onto a non-home, non-Mecatol Rex planet you control, this planet becomes a Legendary Planet. Any player who controls this planet gains 1 Victory Point while this planet is under their control. This planet can never be invaded by the Emperor player.

If the Viceroy activates a system that contains 1 or more of the Emperor player's units, or if the Emperor player is eliminated, remove this card from the play area and the "Galactic Consulate" token and return it to the Emperor player.
